name: NSTextAttachmentContainer
desc: A set of methods that defines the interface to text attachment objects from a layout manager.

items.name: func attachmentBounds(for: NSTextContainer?, proposedLineFragment: CGRect, glyphPosition: CGPoint, characterIndex: Int) -> CGRect
items.desc: Returns the layout bounds of the text attachment to the layout manager.

items.name: func image(forBounds: CGRect, textContainer: NSTextContainer?, characterIndex: Int) -> UIImage?
items.desc: Returns the image object that the layout manager renders in the specified image bounds rectangle inside the text container.
